msg: Remove duplicated XSD files: the XSD files must be in the xsd directory.

msg: * Added the support of temporal.from, temporal.filters (with fallback to requires.from and requires.filters) to the temporal dependency handler

author: stephenc
msg: o Adds some "smarts" to the reports so that they can be skipped always or skipped only if the reports they are generating are missing and allows these smarts to be specified per report type.
o Todo: put in some integration tests for the report smart skipping
